column3: string
气泡内容|n|{city}=占领城市|n|{name}=玩家名称
column4: 半身像名字|n|{name}=玩家名称|n|{actor}=初始艺人名称|n|{repeatactor}=重复探查艺人

column3: content
There you are, ready to open your film studio? Today is the big day.

column2: A producer you worked with several times during your acting career. Tired of the film industry, she decided to join you when you raised the idea of changing the rules of the movie business.

column3: Sure, let's get to work!
But we aren't going to be able to pay for everything out of our pockets. We need an investor.
I've already thought of that. There are already several interested investors who are ready to support us!
This should be enough to get things started. I've also convinced one of my actor friends to join us, guess who it is?
Now that we have some capital and a star, it is time to start building!
The United Movie Association has given us a fund as support to help us on our artistic journey.
Good, we can put it to use for our first movie!
They all sound really interesting…Makes it hard to choose only one.
Different screenplays attract different audiences. We have to look at what the market likes before we make a decision.
I see, but we don't have our own Marketing Department yet, guess we'll have to go by feel for now.
Hold on, this screenplay requires 2 characters but we only got one actor for now. Should we find an extra to play the role?
No, the first movie is too important. We can't risk lowering its quality by using extras. Don't worry, I already have a plan.
I suspected this would be a good script when you sent it over, but I'm surprised by how good it was. I'm in!
Rock's leaving? But I thought you convinced him to join us.
Sadly, he's still under contract somewhere else, but he promised to return once we have more buzz and have completed more tasks!

column2: A famous actor, also a good friend of yours. He starred in your first movie, but needs to return to his other films due to signed contracts. You can sign him to your studio once you complete all main tasks!

column3: We're finally going to sign another actor! I wonder what kind of person it will be?
You're used to being the star, but now that you're the producer you need to get your hands dirty with really marketing a movie properly.
Yeah, you're right. Though back then I didn't notice how it all goes. What should we do next?
We need to spread the word about our film, block by block!
As the company keeps growing, we can't be expected to do everything ourselves. Hiring a secretary would allow us to get more work done.
The roadshow was a success! The fans loved it and have actually started a club. We will now keep earning more and more fans!
Some quality movies will receive great reviews, but then lose out at the box office. Some bad movies can also find an audience to buy enough tickets. This is really confusing.
That's the beauty of show business! We can't predict how the box office will turn out, but we can focus on making the best possible film.
Well said. Let's make the best movie we can and hope the audience is into it!
You really think this is going to end well for you? How naive...
Now that we've grown so much, I find myself a bit overwhelmed. There is too much work and it's starting to feel like things are slipping. How can I solve this?
Try making plans for your daily tasks more clearly. This will help you get a better grasp of what is going on with the company.
You're right! I just wish my planning skills were as good as my acting.
I'll keep giving you some help, but you really need to start handling this on our own. The schedule is getting crazier.
Sounds good, oh and before I forget! Rock's contract has expired, so he's now free to sign with us!
This is the third city where we've performed a roadshow. We're doing pretty well, aren't we?
The road to success never stops, but you can take pride in what we have achieved so far!
That's the spirit! This attitude is why I decided to join you guys in the first place. Now let's keep making some great movies!
Strange...Our roadshow is a success, but the amount of audience is much less than before.
Yeah, I noticed. And they seemed distracted too. Is there something wrong with our advertising strategy?
This is worrying...We need to find out the reason.
How's your mission going?

column2: CEO of Megastar Films, and your former boss.He controls the city's movie industry. Cold and ruthless, he will do anything to achieve his goals. He's currently upset about you, perhaps not only because of your retirement announcement.

column3: As planned, Mr.Kevin. They're probably still wondering what's going on here.

column2: Kevin's secretary, a highly capable and beautiful woman. She seems pretty interested in your intense relationship with Kevin, and will even push things further in her own ways.

column3: This roadshow is the same with last one. At least one thing is clear, it cannot be an accident. Got any clue about it?
Well, we don't have proof yet, but I'm pretty sure Megastar Films are behind this.
Megastar Films? I see...
They still didn't make any moves. Do you think {name} just gave up?
If so, I'm totally wasting my time on them then.
Sounds like you are expecting them to fight back, Mr.Kevin.
Our next roadshow will be about that new movie we're preparing.
No problem, but with Megastar Films keep disturbing us, I doubt it'll be a big success...
If Kevin is still the person I know, I think we should be fine.
Well, we don't have better solutions anyway, so why not?
It worked! Our roadshow is finally the way it should be!
Yeah...
What happened? You seem not happy about it.
Actually, I'm kind of feeling bad about the plan worked as I thought.
This is the 10th city we covered. Remember the time when we founded our company and filmed our first movie, it feels just like yesterday.
Yes, and we've overcomed many obstacles, especially now that Megastar Films stoped causing troubles for our roadshow.
Honestly, I had my doubts in the beginning. I didn't think of seeing this day coming so soon.
Well, we can't come this far without everyone's contribution to the company. Let's celebrate after our work here is done!
May I ask something?
You wanna know why I stoped messing with their roadshows. Do you remember the theme of their roadshow the last time?
If I remember it right, it's about a movie based on an actual  anti-narcotics operation?
Correct. It is a successful operation, but not every agent lives to see the victory. At least, my son did not. {name} knows that too.
Things are pretty quiet these days...
Haha, isn't it a good sign? Are you expecting some 'surprise'?
Surely not. Just hope this isn't the calm before the storm.
Is this the list of all possible investors?
Yes. Unless they find ways to convince some total outsiders to make investment.
I got a hold of {name}'s connections. As for that assistant girl, I don't see how she can be a threat. Just stick to this list.
No problem, sir.
I'm willing to do anything for company as long it's within my range. But are you sure you want to do this, boss?
Attack is the best defense, isn't it? I don't want to just sit here worrying about Megastar's next move.
Understood. How about Ms.Jones? Shall we let her know about this?
I 'll tell her when the time is right. As for now, it's safer to keep it between us.
You suspect me for such a void reason? What can I get by doing this? Did you forget I worked with you ever since the day this conpany was founded?
Stop pretending! But you're right, you've been here too long. Maybe it's time for you to 'take a rest'.
How dare you!
Wait! Calm down, both of you! What happened?
Oh, Look at today's headline-'Former Oskar winner, {name} publicly argue with their actor! Relationship broken?'
Huh, they begun to lose their cool.
You think they are only putting on a show?
A disappointing show... But beating them at their own game is not a bad idea.
So what's your answer? We truely hope you can join us at Megastar Films.
If I agreed, it will only make me the person {name} falsely take me for.
But saying no to us wouldn't change it either. Be wise about it, you know clear that we can offer you more. Everyone should be responsible for their own future.
...I need to think this over.
They're playing hard to get now, things are going with our script.
Keep it that way. How's the other thing going?
So far so good. I'm already working on the details about the meeting with the listed investors.
Good. Report to me after the preparation is all done.
Megastar Films is recruiting {actor}. Do you really think it's okay?
Actually, this is what I want to see. Our 'agruement' is intentional. I want {actor} to join them, as our spy.
I see. But you could have told me first, I was really worried before.
Haha, sorry. But you know what they say, if you want to fool your enemy, you need to fool yourself first.
Did you see the news today? Megastar Films has announced thier cooperation with {actor}.
Yes. Our contract with {First player} is still effective, they won't be able to reach official contract yet. (First player) also needs to earn their trust.
With (actor)'s acting skills, I believe it's only a matter of time!
Now that {actor} is officially 'cooperating' with us, what shall we do next?
We just let a chessman play its role.
Of course.
Sorry, I didn't aquire much information by now.
No worries, it takes time for them to trust you.
{name} seems still waiting for their 'messeger' to give them some clues.
They'll never make it further if they keep being stupid like this.
That's good for us. They have no idea what we're actually doing.
This meeting ends well.
Sure. They have no reason to refuse.
{name}'s face should be really funny upon hearing the news.
We've covered more than half cities in this country, this is inspiring!
Yeah, I'm glad I made the right choice to join you!
Sorry to interupt, but I've got some disturbing news.
So that's what they've been doing.
Yes. A friend of mine told me about their meeting with Kevin, the investors all agreed to stop funding us.
How could they?
It's reasonable. They'll own a favor from Kevin, which is valuable in this industry.
We can cancel our 'Spy' plan now.
Do you think Megastar Films found out already?
(Sigh) Not only found out. They used {actor} to attract our attention, so we won't notice what they're actually doing.
{name} made up with {actor}, they must heard the news now.
We'll just see what they'll do next.
Our financial situation maybe fine by now, but we won't be able to last long with no extra funds at all.
I know. That's why Kevin did this.
You really gonna hold a party and invite all our investors, and Kevin?
Yes. Since they didn't make a public announcement yet, we still got a chance.
But are you sure it's gonna work?
The key point is we get Kevin to show up at our party, everything else is based on it.
{name} sent an invitation for you to their party, Mr.Kevin.
I know what they're up to. I'll be helping them even by just showing up at the party.
So the answer is no. I'll make sure they got your reply.
So, Kevin's not gonna coming to your party. What will you do now?
Thought you should have more important things to do than delivering message like this.
I do, but bad news need to be told in person, don't you agree?
I'm not surprised that Kevin refused our invitation. What should we do now?
Guess I need to try my luck now…
Hi Ms.Messager, would you mind to give my reply to Kevin in person too?
Not at all. As long as your reply interests me.
(Whispering…) Well, what do you think?
Consider it done. I'm looking forward to see how this goes.
{name} wants to meet with me in person? What makes they think I'll agree to it?
You might want to hear the location they chose. It's at…(Whispering...)
I see…
You are close, aren't you? Or, used to be so close?
You mean Kevin and me?
Yeah. I just feel you guys know each other so well. You are not just competitors, right?
Your feeling is right. Actually, Kevin made me the person I am today.
You chose the place I wouldn't say no to. Now talk.
It's been 10 years, Kevin. Since the day my best friend-your son, was killed in that operation.
So you just want to give him your regards at his grave?
He died before you have the chance to repair your relationship. But you still don't understand, even after all these years...
What should I Understand? The fact that he refused all my arrangements for him to have a wonderful life, instead he got himself killed?
Is the arranged life truly wonderful for him? Kevin, he's not some character in your screenplay, he has his own thoughts and emotions. You can't just arrange him to live a life you want!
He didn't mention to anyone that you're his father, but he's trying to prove to you that he can manage his own life. His death is a tragedy, but it's you who let him die with regrets!
You are the best teacher I can ever hope to have. I know you're mad at me for quitting acting, but just like your son, I'm not a character whose fate is already written in the screenplay either.
...Do what you want in the party. I won't interfere.
Thanks, Kevin! Come to the party as my most respectful teacher and competitor! I'll make you proud!
Fine. Don't disappoint me.
How's your meeting with Kevin? Will he come to our party?
Relax, I've got it all under control.
Now, let's get the party on!

As the boss of our company, you need to pay close attention to our financial situation. We're lucky this time that our investors have faith in us and offered help, but we cannot count on our luck everytime.
Sure, I'm sorry. I'll be more careful in the future.
How are you feeling, attending the Oskar ceremony again after all this time?
Well, next time I'm on that stage, will not be as an actor, but a producer!
Haha, sure. But it's not easy to hold that trophy.
Of course, but that's what drives us to become better! After all, we need more trophies to climb the ranks!
Look, that's  rewards for our movies filmed today!
Nice to see this after a day's hard work, haha.
The better our box office is, the higher our rank is! Along with more rewards of course!
Looks pretty good actually! We're closer to the top than I thought we were.
Wow, I thought you had more faith in us than that.
Oh I have plenty of faith! But with us being a new player on the block and all, I was a bit worried. Looks like I didn't need to be though. Let's keep it up!
Now we have our own Finance Department, we can exchange coins for moviedollars in emergency!
Great! We don't need to worry about lack of funds during movie filming process!
Sure, but there is a time limit for exchange, so make sure we use it wisely!
Of course, I'm aware of that!
We've received a 5 star screenplay! I can't wait to see what a success we can make out of it!
Never thought the rank of screenplay would have such big influence upon movies…I always think the actor is the key of a movie's quality.
Haha, actors sure are important, but think of what a boost it'll be if we have both skilled actors and great screenplays!
We've already signed contract, did you forget? But if you choose to sign with me again anyway, I'll give you my contract and other perks as gift!
Now we can seek to reach a good deal with our business partners here!
Negotiation is an important part of our business, make sure to choose your words wisely!
We have our own screenplay collection now, but there are still so many great screenplays out here!
Sure, we'll keep searching and add them to our collection!
Business is war without bullets, we need to find ourself a reliable ally!
I agree. Let's list our candidates!
Here we can view all the actors that are away right. Note that they can't be assigned to do any work in this condition.
I know, but we can still pay a small amount to call them back and be avaliable for work again!
Take training lessons can improve our actors' attributes! But the training lessons are truly expensive…
Yeah, which requires us to be very careful about how to arrange these lessons.
Now our actors can train their skills in this Training Room!
Good! Their skills can surely help imroving our movie's quality!
We'll receive rewards from The United Movie Association every 10 levels!
That will surely be benefitting our company!
We've rised to block rank 2! The United Movie Association has given us 5 trophies as reward!
Nice, now we're closer to next rank!
Here are today's arrangements for you! Don't forget that we're following your example!
Of course! I'm a boss of my words.
